translated: The Book of Conditional Relations🔽The Chapter on the Conditions for the Doctrinal Exemplifications

original: Dhammapaccanīyānuloma (4), Dukatikapaṭṭhānapāḷi (3)🔽21.30. Hetuduka, Micchattaniyatattika🔽Nahetuṁ namicchattaniyataṁ dhammaṁ paccayā hetu micchattaniyato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi.🔽Nahetuṁ nasammattaniyataṁ dhammaṁ paccayā hetu sammattaniyato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi.🔽Nahetuṁ naaniyataṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nahetu aniyato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Nanahetuṁ🔽naaniyataṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nahetu aniyato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
analyzed: dhamma paccanīya anuloma duka tika paṭṭhāna pāḷi  hetu duka micchat ta niyata ttika  na hetum na micchatta niyatam dhammam paccayā hetu micchatta niyataḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā hetuyā tīṇi pe avigate tīṇi  na hetum na sammatta niyatam dhammam paccayā hetu sammatta niyataḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā saṅkhitta hetuyā tīṇi pe avigate tīṇi  na hetum na aniyatam dhammam paṭicca na hetu aniyataḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā na na hetu  na aniyatam dhammam paṭicca na hetu aniyataḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā
translated: The Section on the Doctrinal Exemplifications in Triads

original: Hetuyā tīṇi, adhipatiyā tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi.
analyzed: hetuyā tīṇi adhipatiyā tīṇi pe avigate tīṇi
